config.wind_weatherwind_tooltip: Allows wind on a windy and storm weather day
config.wind_winterwind_tooltip: Allows wind on a snowy day in winter
config.wind_bushes_tooltip: Whether bushes are affected by wind or not
config.wind_crops_tooltip: Whether crops are affected by wind or not
config.wind_grass_tooltip: Whether grass is affected by wind or not
config.wind_trees_tooltip: Whether trees (regular or fruit) are affected by wind or not
